(42) 379.August 26, 1942.TO BE KEPT UNDER LOCK AND key it is requested that special care may be taken toensure the secrecy of this document war CABINET.THE MIDDLE EAST.Directive to the Commander-in-Chief.THE annexed Directive, of which a manuscript copy was handed to theCommander-in-Chief, Middle East, by the Prime Minister on the 23rd August,1942, is circulated by direction of the Prime Minister.(Signed) E.E. BRIDGES,Secretary of the War Cabinet.Great George Street, S.W.1.ANNEX.Cairo.Commander-in-Chief, Middle East.If at any time, for the purposes of manoeuvre, you find it necessary to uncoverthe Capital or Alexandria, you should place General Sir Henry Wilson in temporary command of the Delta with plenary powers.W. S. C.A. F. B.August 23, 1942.[24266]
